About Me

小本职 · Expertise

中山大学地理科学与规划学院
地理信息科学专业本科在读
Undergraduated student in School of Geography and Planning, Sun Yat-sen University. Major subject is Geographical Information Science.

小闲情 · Hobbies

喜欢写点东西，偶尔涂鸦作文，
近来在读中国当代小说
Enjoy writing. Write novels or draw pictures from time to time. Recently interest in reading novels by contemporary chinese writors.

小玩乐 · Joy

爱好科技、旅行、动漫,
最近在玩棒球和网球
Interst in science and technology. Enjoy going trip, love animation and manga, recently play baseball and tennis.
